Attention! Changing the language will take a few seconds!
You failed!

Thanks for playing!
We hope you enjoyed it and someday you will come back.

Greetings! Here is your {Spark of Intelligence}, mortal! Locked in this magical chest. Wait for 2 hours for it to open or {pay} to skip the <timer>.
Wahahahahahahahaaa!
Pause?
What are you doing here? Go play.
Coffee won't help you.
Do you pause match-3 as well?
Dam, and you still have an interview to pass.
Are you sure you want to be a game designer?
These tasks are from the USSR kindergarten..
Impudent mortal! So you are here at last!
Deal with all the evil tricks my minions will put upon you and get the {Spark of Intelligence}! Fail to do so and fall into [oblivion].
Let us begin!
Greetings, wretched person! Once was I man's greatest friend, but they forgot about me! Answer my questions correctly and I will return to the owner.
You are wise, two-legged! The next question.
Suffer the [pain], human! Feel what it was like for me to lose my dignity!
Arghhhhhh...
You have perished. Watch video AD to come back to life.
Stand still! Now I small smite you down with the vicious blow!,
Hail to thee, human. I sold my soul in pursuit of black arts mastery! Shall you answer all of my riddles I would collapse in shame.
Thou are correct. Let us proceed.
Suffer the [pain], human!
I collaaapppsss...
You have perished. Watch video AD to come back to life.
Despair not! Even the weariest river flows somewhere safe to sea..,
Weak human, you are unlikely to answer MY questions, for I am the great Ozymouth itself.
How can you be right? The next question!
Suffer the [pain], human!
Hubschsch...
You have perished. Watch video AD to come back to life.
Lament! Close you eyes and forget your pain...,
Tremble, ill-fated, only miracle can save you now for my questions are from Hell itself!
Uncanny guess! Lets see how much longer Lady Luck is on your side..
Mwahaha! Vae Victis!
No! No! God, no!
You have perished. Watch video AD to come back to life.
You death will be slooooow.. QUACK
Unbelievable, but you have defeated all of my minions. Face me in the ultimate combat of brilliant minds!
How poignant is you wit!
You will pay dearly for this mistake!
Incomprehensible! Impossible! Improbable! Aaaaa!
You have perished. Watch video AD to come back to life.
And the happy end was sooo close..

I may deal critical damage with Value1% chance for each strike. 
 What are the chances of getting Value2 criticals in a row?
How many 3-rune spells may an adept warlock cast with runestones [Blood], <Ice> and {Vodka}?
In Marshlands Value1 adventurers die by the [sword], Value2 by the [dagger] and Value3 by [stray arrows]. What is the chance to die there from the good old <melee weapon>?

Each of two members of Thieves Guild may <pickpocket> the nobleman with an armored guard Value1 times out of Value2. What is the chance that at least one of them would make it out of the tavern alive?

Five adventurers need to defend the wood house against [goblin raiders]. One of them shall guard the door, one the rear exit, one the front door and two are needed for both windows.
What is the numer of possible <defending formations> if all the adventurers are equally capable of defending each point?

Adventurers may cross the <woodland> afoot or astride, the <reverland> afoot, astride or by the raft and the <swampland> astride or using the underground caves. In how many ways can the party plan their <journey>?

I can [slash] you with my sword blade, [pierce] you with its edge, [stun] you with its hilt, [scratch] you with its tip or lunge and [impale] you. How many Value2-hit <combos> with different <strikes> can I perform?

A sorceress and her twin sister attack you from two sides. One with the <Icebolt spell> that may hit either you or her sister. Another with the [torch] with Value2% chance to hit. What is the chance of turning into the deeply frosen and badly burnt corpse?

Each of the crates contains Value1 <potions>. {Iron crate} contains Value2 [heal potions], Wooden crate contains only Value3,  [Blood crate] contains Value4 of these. You get a random <potion> from each of them. What is the chance of drinking 3 [heal potions]?

Elven archer got Value1 <oil arrows>, Value2 {poison arrows} and Value3 [fire arrows] in his quiver. He randomly picks <two> one after another and shoots at you. Elven archers are really fast and they never miss their target. What is the chance of being <oiled> and then [set afire]?
Elf, human, halfling, orc, dwarf and lizardman are held captive in my keep and are to be [sacrificed] to the Demon Lord one after another.  In how many ways can these [sacrifices] be made?

In the Empty Fireplace <tavern> the group of Value1 brigands meets the rival group of other Value1 brigands. Each group ballots to choose a combatant for the <duel>.

How many pairs of brigand combatants are possible?

There are four fighters and five war mages in the Adventurers Guild. How many different <teams> of three can be assembled for the <quest> if the <team> should always have two fighters and a single mage?

The school of [Fire Magic] allows 8 <spells> for its members to learn and use. The novice mage has the capacity to memorize only 4 of these. How many <spell> combinations can be memorized by the novice mage if he definitly wants to have [Spark] and [Firebolt] in his repertoire?

Alchemist Store is offering <potions> that increase a single <attribute>: intelligence, strength, agility, wisdom or charisma by +1. In how many ways can your <attributes> be increased if you take Value2 random <potions>?

Brom the <weaponsmith> smiths half of the <swords> in the {city of Brass}. His brother Grom smiths only one tenth of <swords>. Their brother Crom smiths the rest. Brom <enchants> Value1 of 10 <swords>, Grom - Value2 of 10 <swords> and Crom just one of ten <swords>. What is the chance of buying an enchanted <sword> in the {city of Brass}?

Hero opens the chest. There will be an item with a 5% chance. If there is no item there, then the chance increases by 5%, otherwise it is reset to the initial value. What is the ratio of chests with and without items?

Brom the <weaponsmith> smiths half of the <swords> in the {city of Brass}. His brother Grom smiths one tenth of <swords>. Their brother Crom smiths the rest. Brom <enchants> three of each ten <swords>, Grom - seven of ten <swords> and Crom just one of ten <swords>. You managed to buy an enchanted <sword> with a 10% {discount}. What is the chance that it is made by Grom?

There are Value1 mercenaries in the <Blackrock castle>. A pair of them is needed to deliver the message, a team of three is sufficient for getting provisions in the village and the rest should stay in the <castle>. How many ways are there to assemble such teams if mercenaries are totally expendable?

Adventurer will be crossing the <desert> for Value1 days. He has Value2 loaths of <stale bread> and Value3 [apples]. Each day he has to eat one piece of <food> or become the <food> for [vultures]. In how many ways can he diversify his meals providing he will not be killed by scorpions?

Ten members of Thieves Guild need to share their {loot}. They decided to assemble a {working group} to make sure everything is sort of fair. The {working group} has to have at least two members. How many various {working groups} can be assembled?

The king announces the jousting {tournament} and Value1 noble knights are willing to take part. Each knight has to [fight] once against every other participant. How many [fights] will commoners behold if the good king makes everyone use <non-lethal spears>?

There are Value1 floors in the magic castle, and every day a staircase can appear between every two floors with a 50% chance. The stairs disappear at night. How many triangles are obtained from stairs on average every day. Example of a triangle: stairs 1 to 5, 5 to 6, and 1 to 6.

The Thieves Guild is recruiting members according to the following principle. The candidate must roll a d10 5 times in a row, each roll must be greater than the current roll number. What is the chance that he will end up in the guild?
The merchant with closed eyes throws 5 items into 3 chests. What is the chance that at least one will remain empty?
